channel.title: git on Getting Started
channel.description: Recent content in git on Getting Started

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: Git Resources Git is a powerful versioning control system that allows you to keep track of changes for your files. Additionally, it allows for collaboration with other people on the same project. It is recommended to develop your work using a versioning tool such as git. Quick Git Intro Peder Larson Group: Git Tutorial Software Development for Scientists

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: Onboarding Checklist 1. Get a Zoom account: Email Ana Maria Deluca a brief description of who you are and which group you belong to 2. Get two-factor authentication 3. Get Pulse secure VPN access 4. Request Radiology GitHub access (requires UCSF login) .notice{padding:18px;line-height:24px;margin-bottom:24px;border-radius:4px;color:#444;background:#e7f2fa}.notice p:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.notice-title{margin:-18px -18px 12px;padding:4px 18px;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;font-weight:700;color:#fff;background:#6ab0de}.notice.warning .notice-title{background:rgba(217,83,79,.9)}.notice.warning{background:#fae2e2}.notice.info .notice-title{background:#f0b37e}.notice.info{background:#fff2db}.notice.note .notice-title{background:#6ab0de}.notice.note{background:#e7f2fA}.notice.tip .notice-title{background:rgba(92,184,92,.8)}.notice.tip{background:#e6f9e6}.icon-notice{display:inline-flex;align-self:center;margin-right:8px}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice svg{height:1em;width:1em;fill:currentColor}.icon-notice img,.icon-notice.baseline svg{top:0.125em;position:relative} Note Write Radiology under Additional Information at the bottom of the form.
